title: R3AKTCommand
description: Control-plane command envelope. Transport class is LXMF FIELD_COMMANDS (0x09).

command_id.description: Unique command identifier used to correlate FIELD_RESULTS (0x0A) replies.

topics.description: Logical topic intent. May be mirrored in LXMF FIELD_GROUP (0x0B) metadata for scoped fan-out.

correlation_id.description: Client-supplied correlation token preserved in command outcome messages.
